<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Magic Cube</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 1 second</span><br>
<span style='color:black'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=355 valign=top style='width:3.7in;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:justify'>An <b><i>N</i>
  </b><b><span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
  Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>´</span></span>
  <i>N</i> </b><b><span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
  Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>´</span></span>
  <i>N</i></b> <i>magic cube</i> is a cube composed of <b><i>N</i><sup>3</sup></b>
  consecutive integers (usually 1 through <b><i>N</i><sup>3</sup></b>) arranged
  in such way that each row, each column, each main diagonal of the square
  cross sections, and each of the four triagonals containing <b><i>N</i></b>
  integers adds up to the same sum. Though it is not easy to construct a magic
  cube when <b><i>N</i></b> is even, there is a very simple approach for
  constructing one when <i>N</i> is odd.</p>
  </td>
  <td width=276 valign=top style='width:207.0pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:87.75pt;
   height:95.25pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=117 height=127
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Visio.Drawing.5" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1159207234">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:center'><b><u>Fig.
  1</u>:</b> Triagonals (dotted lines)</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyTextIndent style='text-indent:0in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyTextIndent style='text-indent:0in'>To construct an odd order
magic cube, start by placing the integer 1 at the center of the bottom layer of
the cube (Fig. 2). Then proceed diagonally down to the right along the central
vertical square cross section (the shaded vertical plane in Fig. 2), and keep
placing consecutive integers in every empty location you visit. When you run
off the bottom of the plane, your reenter at the top. When you run off the
right-hand side, you reenter on the left-hand side.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyTextIndent style='text-indent:0in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=199 valign=top style='width:149.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyTextIndent style='text-indent:0in'>Every time you find a
  non-empty location on your way, just go back one layer and down one, as shown
  in Fig. 2 for the move from 5 to 6. Continue to proceed diagonally in the new
  plane, repeating the one back and one down step as required. If the one
  back and one down step does not work, i.e., you still arrive at a non-empty
  location, just go up one layer and continue moving diagonally. The up one
  step is shown in Fig. 3 for the move from 25 to 26. </p>
  </td>
  <td width=420 valign=top style='width:315.0pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyTextIndent align=center style='text-align:center;text-indent:
  0in'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
   style='width:303pt;height:4in' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=404 height=384
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Visio.Drawing.5" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1159207235">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyTextIndent align=center style='text-align:center;text-indent:
  0in'><b><u>Fig. 2</u>:</b> The one back and one down move</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyTextIndent align=center style='text-align:center;text-indent:
0in'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:192pt;
 height:297pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=256 height=396
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/./b_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Visio.Drawing.5" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1159207236">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:center'><b><u>Fig.
3</u>: </b>The up one move</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:justify'>The input may
contain multiple test cases. Each line of the input contains an odd integer <b><i>N</i>
</b>(1 <span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N</i></b>
<span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span>
25) giving the dimension of the cube.<br><br>Input is terminated by a zero. This zero should not be processed. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span></b>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:justify'>For each test
case in the input output the corresponding magic cube as follows. First print
the numbers in the top layer of the cube, followed by numbers in the second
layer, then the numbers in the third layer, and so on. For each layer first
print the numbers in row <b>A</b> (see Fig. 2 and Fig. 3) on one line from left
to right (<b>A1</b> to <b>A<i>N</i></b>), followed by the numbers in row <b>B</b>
on the next line, then row <b>C</b> on the third line, and so on. Print each
number right aligned on a field of width 5, and separate two successive such
fields on the same line by a white space character. Print a blank line between
two successive layers. </p>

<p class=MsoHeader style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader style='text-align:justify'>Separate the output for every two
successive test cases by a blank line.</p>

<p class=MsoHeader>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoHeader><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                           </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span

  </td>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:240.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=Preformatted0 style='mso-pagination:widow-orphan;tab-stops:.5in;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span

  </span>19<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">     </span>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span

  yes">  </span>3<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">    </span>14<span
  style="mso-spacerun: yes">    </span>25<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

	text-underline:single;}
p
	{margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
tt
	{mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";}

	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;

	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1

 /* List Definitions */
@list l0
	{mso-list-id:604071897;

	mso-list-template-ids:1780613412 -195527388 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715;}

	{mso-level-number-format:alpha-lower;
	mso-level-text:"%1\)";

	margin-left:21.0pt;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	mso-level-number-position:left;

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoTitle><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Problem C</span><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>New Rule in Euphomia</span><br>
<span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input:</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-weight:
normal'> standard input<br>
</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output:</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-weight:
normal'> standard output<br>
</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Time
Limit: </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-weight:normal'>1 second</span><span style='font-size:
28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoSubtitle><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>The ancient country of Euphomia had some strange rules
regarding payment of prices and values of coins. When King Albert ruled this
country the following payment rules were in place:</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]>a)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>The
name of the currency was Abacus.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]>b)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>Only
coins were used to pay any certain amount.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]>c)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>The
coins had integer values. Eg. There is no coin with value <b>1.5</b> Abacus.
And the amount to be paid was also always integer.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]>d)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>There
was no <b>1</b> Abacus coin.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">   </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]>e)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>Payments
of any amount had to be made with coins of the same value. For example when one
paid <b>9</b> Abacus he paid it with three <b>3</b>-Abacus coins.<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>So coins were made so that any one could pay any amount
within <b>2-1000000</b> abacuses following the above rules. The coins, which
were not required, were not made. For example there were no <b>6</b>-Abacus
coin because one could pay <b>6</b> Abacus as <b>(3+3)</b> Abacus. The problem
with the above rule was that often one had to use many coins to pay a
particular amounts. For example to pay the amount <b>2048</b> Abacus one had to
use <b>1024</b> <b>2</b>-Abacus coins which is quite terrible. Therefore, when
king Lucas captured this country he made unlimited coins of value <b>1</b>
Abacus and added the following rule:</p>

<pre style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify;line-height:14.4pt'><tt><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black'>One can only use exactly two different coins made during Albert's regime. In addition with these coins one can also use the <b>1</b>-Abacus coins at any number. However one cannot use only the <b>1</b>-Abacus coins to make payment.&quot;<o:p></o:p></span></tt></pre>

<p class=MsoBodyText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>So in this new rule paying <b>1</b> Abacus is still
impossible but rule d) and e) of Alberts regime is now obsolete. With this new
rule in place your job is to find out in how many ways one could pay a certain
amount <b>n</b>. </p>


<center><img width=588 height=294
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/p10742.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"></center>
<h3><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>For
example one can now pay </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt'>10</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>-Abacus in the following five ways:<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>a)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>3+2+1+1+1+1+1<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>b)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>7+3<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>c)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>5+2+1+1+1<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>d)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>7+2+1<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>e)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;
font-weight:normal'>5+3+1+1<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>The input file contains less than </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt'>600</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'> lines of
inputs. Each line of the input file contains one value of </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt'>n (0&lt;n&lt;=1000000), </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>which
indicates the amount to be paid. Input is terminated by a line where </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt'>n=0</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>.
Obviously this line should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>For each line of input except the last one produce
one line of output, which contains the serial of output followed by an integer
which indicates in how many ways one can pay </span><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt'>n </span><span style='font-weight:normal'>abacus
with the new rules in place</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.5pt;font-weight:normal'>. Look at the output for sample input for details.<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                           </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

<title>Problem D - Blocks on Blocks</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1031"/>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:65.2pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoPlainText align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span lang=SV
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Blocks
on Blocks</span></b><span lang=SV><br>
</span><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 1 seconds</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>If you know the game 'tetris', you may be
familiar with the following figures:<o:p></o:p></span></p>


<center><img width=563 height=106 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/p10743a.jpg" ></center>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=SV>These figures contains rows of squares. In
each row, squares are consecutive. Adjacent rows share at least one side of a
square, so the following figures are not allowed:</span></p>

<center><img width=288 height=76 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/p10743a.jpg" ></center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<br style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US'>Given the number of squares, count the number of figures. Since the
number may be huge, you may only print the lower <b>4 DIGITS</b> if the answer
exceeds <b>9999</b>, otherwise print out every significant digit of the number.</span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US'>The first line of input contains a single integer <b>t(1&lt;=t&lt;=20)</b>,
the number of test cases. Each test case contains a single integer <b>n(1&lt;=n&lt;=1,000,000,000)</b>,
the number of squares.</span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h1 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US;font-weight:normal'>For each test case, print out the case number of your
answer followed by the required number or digits as described in the problem
statement.</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1><span lang=SV>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                               </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
lang=SV style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=322 valign=top style='width:3.35in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>7</span></b><span
  lang=SV style='mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=322 valign=top style='width:3.35in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>Case 1: 6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <h4 style='tab-stops:65.2pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>Case 2: 61<o:p></o:p></span></h4>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>Case 3: 629</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=SV style='mso-fareast-language:
  ZH-CN'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.MsoCaption, li.MsoCaption, div.MsoCaption
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoTitle, li.MsoTitle, div.MsoTitle
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:center;

	font-weight:bold;
	mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;}

	{margin:0in;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1033"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>The Optimal Super Highway</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 1 second<br>
</span>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>In our real life when we look for help we find that only a
few people are willing to help us but when we look for suggestions there are thousands
waiting with their bag of suggestions. In the country named Culabura a similar
situation is creating a lot of trouble. Culabura is a country containing around
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>20000</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> important places and infinite land area.
The president of Culabura wants to build a super highway through his country.
This super highway can be expressed by a straight line that fulfills the
following two properties:<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>a)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>It must be parallel to another road that connects the two
most important cities (denoted by </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>A</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> and </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>B</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>) of the country.<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>b)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span><![endif]>The summation of distances of all-important places from it
must be minimum.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>


<center><img width=456 height=385 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/107/p10744.jpg" ></center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The advisers of the king of
Culabura are giving random and meaningless suggestions to solve this problem
(As always is the case with advisers). Now your job is to find the minimum summation
of distance. For example in the above picture you will have to find the minimum
possible value of <b>(d<sub>1 </sub>+ d<sub>2 </sub>+ d<sub>3 </sub>+ d<sub>4 </sub>+
d<sub>5 </sub>+ d<sub>6 </sub>+ d<sub>7 </sub>+ d<sub>8</sub>)</b>. In other
words you will have to place the superhighway in such a place so that <b>(d<sub>1
</sub>+ d<sub>2 </sub>+ d<sub>3 </sub>+ d<sub>4 </sub>+ d<sub>5 </sub>+ d<sub>6
</sub>+ d<sub>7 </sub>+ d<sub>8</sub>)</b> is minimum and you will have print
this minimum value. In this problem we will call such minimum value <b>sum_d_min</b>.
Your solution must be very efficient. /*Looking for an <b>O(n)</b> solution */</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><sub><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></sub></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains a single set
of input. First line of each input set contains two integers <b>N
(0&lt;N&lt;20001)</b> and <b>Q(0&lt;Q&lt;101)</b>. Here <b>N</b> is the number
of important places and <b>Q</b> is the number of queries. Each of the next <b>N</b>
lines contains a pair of integer <b>x<sub>i</sub> and y<sub>i</sub> (|x<sub>i</sub>|,
|y<sub>i</sub>|&lt;=100)</b>, where <b>(x<sub>i</sub>, y<sub>i</sub>)</b> is
the coordinate of the <b>i</b>-th <b>(0&lt;=i&lt;=N-1)</b> important place.
Each of the next <b>Q</b> lines contains four integers <b>A<sub>x</sub></b>, <b>A<sub>y</sub></b>,
<b>B<sub>x</sub></b>, <b>B<sub>y</sub></b>, where <b>(A<sub>x</sub>, A<sub>y</sub>)</b>
and <b>(B<sub>x</sub>, B<sub>y</sub>)</b> are the coordinates of <b>A</b> and <b>B</b>
respectively and the optimal super highway must be parallel to street (or line)
<b>AB</b>. You must not consider <b>A</b> and <b>B</b> as part of the <b>N</b>
important places. Some important places may be present more than in the list to
give them extra importance. You dont need to worry about that and just
consider them as two different places. Also remember that place <b>A</b> and <b>B</b>
will always be two different places.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each query
produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output followed by
the value of <b>sum_d_min </b>for that particular query. All the output numbers
should be rounded to nearest integer. Look at the output for sample input for
details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>6 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>20 12<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10 10 11 11<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2 3 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 15<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 15<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

	font-family:Arial;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoBodyText, li.MsoBodyText, div.MsoBodyText
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <w:LatentStyles DefLockedState="false" LatentStyleCount="156">  </w:LatentStyles>
</xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:18.0pt'>Dominant Strings</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
<b>Time Limit:</b> 2 seconds</span><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Given
two strings <i>s<sub>1</sub></i> and <i>s<sub>2</sub></i>, we say that <i>s<sub>1</sub></i>
<i>dominates</i> <i>s<sub>2</sub></i> if the (multi)set of characters in <i>s<sub>1</sub></i>
is a proper superset of the (multi)set of characters in <i>s<sub>2</sub></i>.
For instance, &quot;acmicpc&quot; dominates &quot;camp&quot;, but it does not
dominate &quot;chimp&quot; or &quot;macpac&quot;. For a set <i>S</i> of
strings, we call the strings in <i>S</i> which are not dominated by any string
in <i>S</i> the <i>dominant strings</i> of <i>S</i> (even if they do not
dominate any strings in <i>S</i>). </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Now,
your task is simply to find all the dominant strings of a set of strings. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input contains a single set
of strings, with one string per line. Each string consists of at least one and at
most ten lower-case alphabetic characters. There will be at most 15000 strings,
and no two strings will be identical. Input is terminated by end-of-file.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Output consists of all dominant
strings in the input set, in alphabetical order, one word per line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                           </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>acmicpc<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>cccp<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>macpac<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>chimp<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>camp<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:240.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>acmicpc<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>chimp<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>macpac</span></b></pre>
  <h4><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></h4>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

Sajjad Hossain</span></b></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<h1 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:4.0in'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Problem G</span></b><b><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Crime Wave  The Sequel<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h3><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'>Input:</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Output:</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> Standard Output</span><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 Seconds<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>n</b> banks have been robbed
this fine day. <b>m </b>(greater than or equal to <b>n</b>) police cruisers are
on duty at various locations in the city. <b>n</b> of the cruisers should be
dispatched, one to each of the banks, so as to minimize the average time of
arrival at the <b>n</b> banks. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style="mso-spacerun:
yes"> </span><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4>Input<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains several sets of inputs.
The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input contains <b>0 &lt; n
&lt;= m &lt;= 20</b>. <b>n</b> lines follow, each containing <b>m</b> positive
real numbers: the travel time for cruiser <b>m</b> to reach bank <b>n</b>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a case where <b>m=n=0</b>.
This case should not be processed. <span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4>Output</h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>For each set of input output a single
number: the minimum average travel time, accurate to </span><b>2</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> fractional digits.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<pre style='tab-stops:.5in;mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></pre>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>10.0 23.0 30.0 40.0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5.0 20.0 10.0 60.0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>18.0 20.0 20.0 30.0</span></b><o:p></o:p></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0
  0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13.33</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

style='font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:windowtext'>Gordon
Cormack, EPS <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<title>Problem H - Maximum Subsequence</title>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Maximum Subsequence<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are given a sequence of <b>N </b>integers,
each of which is not greater than <b>10,000</b> considering absolute value.
There are <b>(<sup>N</sup>C<sub>K</sub>)</b> sub-sequences possible from this
sequence. You have to pick such a subsequence, so that multiplication of all
its integers is maximum.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For example, if the sequence is
4, 4, -4, -4 and you are asked to pick 2 integers. You have 2 ways, which will
satisfy the criterion. One is to pick 4,4 and the other is to pick 4, -4.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this case, you have to
consider the sub sequence whose summation of all integers is maximum.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains several
sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each input set starts with <b>2</b>
positive integers <b>N, K</b> <b>(1&lt;=K&lt;=N&lt;=10000)</b>. Next N
non-empty lines contain N integers in total. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a case
where <b>N=0</b> and <b>K=0</b>. This case should not be processed. There will
be at most <b>60</b> test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set of input print in
a single line the summation of the integers in the desired subsequence.<span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Problem setter: Md. Kamruzzaman, EPS<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Special Thanks: Monirul Hasan, EPS<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<title>Problem I - Knights Roaming</title>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Knights Roaming<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:13.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Consider an infinite Chessboard. As the chessboard
is infinite, each of its cells is denoted by two integers (<b>x</b>, <b>y</b>).
There are <b>N </b>knights in this chessboard. Each of these Knights can go
certain steps. So, each knight covers a certain part of the chessboard. It is
possible that, one cell can be covered by more than one knight. Even, two
knights can be in the same position of the board.</span><span style='font-size:
13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:13.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:13.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>You all know that a knight at (<b>x</b>, <b>y</b>)
can go to (<b>x</b></span><b><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>±</span></span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2, y</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>±</span></span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1</span></b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>) and (<b>x</b></span><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>±</span></span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1, y</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>±</span></span></b><b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2</span></b><span
style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>) in next step. In this
problem, you will be given the description of <b>N</b> knights (its initial
position and the steps it can travel at most). You have to find the number of
distinct cells covered by the <b>N</b> knights.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:13.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Each input set starts with <b>N (1&lt;=N&lt;=30) </b>denoting
the number of knights. In next few lines the position (<b>x</b>, <b>y</b>) and
the maximum number of steps <b>k (0&lt;=k&lt;=50) </b>of <b>N</b> knights will
be given. The value of <b>x</b>, <b>y </b>will be in the range <b>10<sup>9</sup></b>
to <b>+10<sup>9</sup></b>. Input is terminated by <b>N=0</b>. There will be at
most <b>50</b> test cases. There is a blank line between two consecutive sets.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each test case, print in a line the number of distinct cells, which can be traversed by any of <b>N</b> knights.
<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5</span></b><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5 5 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5 5 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>-1 -1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>33<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
