<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="7169"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:center;
tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>A New Function</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input File: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>We all know
that any integer number <b>N</b> is divisible by <b>1</b> and <b>N</b>. That is
why these two numbers are not the actual divisors of any numbers. The function <b>SOD(n)</b>
(Sum of divisors) is defined as the summation of all the actual divisors of an
integer number <b>n</b>. For example <b>SOD(24)=2+3+4+6+8+12=35</b>. The
function <b>CSOD(n)</b> (cumulative <b>SOD</b>) of an integer <b>n</b>, is
defined as below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='mso-text-raise:-14.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:207.75pt;
 height:64.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./a_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=277 height=86
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./a_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1172605201">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Given the
value of <b>n</b>, your job is to find the value of <b>CSOD(n)</b>.</p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>The input file contains at most </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>50</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'> lines of input. Each line contains an integer </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>n</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'> </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>(0&#8804;n&#8804;2000000000)</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>. Input is terminated by a line where the
value of </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>n=0</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>. This line should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each line of input produce one line of
output. This line should contain the serial of output followed by the value of </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>CSOD(n)</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>. Look at the output for sample input for details. You can safely assume
that any output number fits in a </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>64</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>-bit signed integer.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>100<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>200000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 1: 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 2: 3150<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 12898681201837053<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="7169"/>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Gergs Cake</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Gerg is having a party, and he
has invited his friends. <b>p</b> of them have arrived already, but <b>a</b>
are running late. To occupy his guests, he tried playing some team games with
them, but he found that it was impossible to divide the <b>p</b> guests into
any number of equal-sized groups of more than one person. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Luckily, he has a backup plan - a cake that he
would like to share between his friends. The cake is in the shape of a square,
and Gerg insists on cutting it up into equal-sized square pieces. He wants to
reserve one slice for each of the <b>a</b> missing friends, and the rest of the
slices have to be divided evenly between the <b>p</b> remaining guests. He does
not want any cake himself. Can he do it? </p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input will consist of several test cases.
Each test case will be given as a non-negative integer <b>a</b> and a positive
integer <b>p</b> as specified above, on a line. Both <b>a</b> and <b>p</b> will
fit into a 32-bit signed integer. The last line will contain &quot;-1 -1&quot;
and should not be processed. </p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each test
case, output &quot;Yes&quot; if the cake can be fairly divided and
&quot;No&quot; otherwise.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1024 17<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2 101<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>-1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><tt><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Yes</span></b></tt><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New"'><br>
  <tt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:11.0pt'>Yes</span></tt><br>
  <tt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:11.0pt'>No</span></tt><br>
  <tt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:11.0pt'>Yes</span></tt></span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: </span><span style='font-family:
"Trebuchet MS"'>Igor Naverniouk</span><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems<br>
</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Three years ago, Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems,
Inc., of the planet Tau Ceti Prime, received a generous contract from the Department
of Stellar Defense (DoSD) to provide the StarBlazers Forces with their
next-generation engines. These engines are primarily to be used for ferrying
large cargos of supplies to several outposts in the outer rim.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>These engines have special properties. First of
all, they only have two speeds: zero and really-really-fast. Secondly, they do
not require any time to go from one speed to the other; They can instantly go
from zero to really-really-fast, and vice-versa.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>In order to receive continued funding, Yoyodyne
must provide the DoSD with a demonstration that they have made significant
progress towards developing these engines (It's always the same old story with
government funding, isn't it?!?!). To do this, the DoSD has set up a series of
buoys in a remote part of the galaxy, and tasked Yoyodyne with navigating each
sequence of buoys given a certain amount of fuel at the start of each sequence.
The engines would keep traveling until the last bouy is reached or it runs out
of fuel, whichever occurs first. We would assume that the fuel consumtion is
uniform throughout the travel.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Assume that each mission starts at location <b>(0,0,1)</b>.
At the start of each mission, and as each buoy is reached, the next buoy to
visit is determined by the closest buoy in the mission that has not yet been
visited. In case of a tie, the buoy information that comes first in the input
is given preference. Your job is to write a program to check if the current
prototype engines can successfully complete each mission, given certain mission
parameters, and provide some statistics about engine performance.</p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p>The input to this problem consists of maximum <b>10</b> missions.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The first line of each mission consists four of
integers. The first integer, <b>f (1 &lt;= f &lt;= 20,000)</b>, is the amount
of fuel (in kernels) in the tanks at the start of the mission, the next number,
<b>b (1 &lt;= b &lt;= 100)</b> is the burn-rate of the fuel in kernels per
second, the third number, <b>r (1 &lt;= r &lt;= 200)</b> defines how fast
really-really-fast is for this mission, in lightyears per second and the fourth
integer <b>n(1&lt;=n&lt;=20)</b> denotes the number of buoys in the mission.
Each of the next <b>n</b> lines contains three integers <b>x,y,z</b> <b>(-2000&lt;=x,y,z&lt;=2000)</b>
defining the <b>(x,y,z)</b> coordinates, in lightyears, of one buoys in this
mission. The coordinates can range from <b>-2000</b> to <b>2000</b> inclusive.
If two buoys have the same coordinate they should be considered as two
different buoys, although the distance between them is zero. </p>

<p>The end of input is signified by a line where <b>f=b=r=n=0</b>..</p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p style='text-align:justify'>You are to output one line for each mission. The
output line begins with the word &quot;Mission&quot;<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">  </span>followed by a space, the mission number, a colon, and a space. If
the mission can be completed, you are to output the word &quot;SUCCESS!!&quot;,
followed by a space, the word &quot;Time:&quot;, a space, the total amount of
time to complete the mission, in seconds, followed by two spaces, the word
&quot;Traveled:&quot;, a space, the total distance traveled for this mission,
in lightyears, followed by two spaces, the words &quot;Fuel Left:&quot;, a
space, and the amount of fuel left in the tanks, in kernels.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>If the mission cannot be completed, you are to
output the word &quot;FAILURE!!&quot;, followed by a space, the word
&quot;Traveled:&quot;, a space, the total distance traveled for this mission,
in lightyears, followed by two spaces, the words &quot;From Home:&quot;, a
space, the distance from the current location to the final buoy, in lightyears,
assuming you would traverse all remaining legs of the mission. All numbers in
the output (Except the serial of mission) should be rounded to two digits after
the decimal point.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">    </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="102%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:102.86%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="22%" valign=top style='width:22.52%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt'>3 1 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:9.0pt;

  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span

  style='mso-tab-count:1'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0 2 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0 3 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>200 1 200 4 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2000 0 0 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span

  style='mso-tab-count:1'>       </span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>-2000 -2000 -2000 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="77%" valign=top style='width:77.48%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 118.9pt;mso-layout-grid-align:
  none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Mission 1: SUCCESS!! Time: 2.00<span

  yes">  </span>Fuel Left: 1.00<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6145"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Lunar Forest</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Linda is a lovely girl living in
the forest. Every morning she wakes up early, plays with animals and enjoys the
beautiful landscape. She loves the forest very much. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>One day, she found an exceptional
shining little thing on the ground. It was a seed! Linda loved it so much that
she immediately took it home.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>That night, Linda had a strange
dream. She was told that the seed was from a lunar tree. If she plants the seed
with care, a beautiful lunar tree can grow up in the forest! What's more, lunar
trees will produce seeds. She can grow a tree, take seeds, plant seeds, then
grow another tree... Then there will be more and more beautiful lunar trees.
What a good idea!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here is how lunar trees are grown
up:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-21.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Every <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>morning</b>,
the height of each lunar tree increases by <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-21.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Every tree has two harvest point <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>HP1</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>HP2 </b>For each harvest
point, the first day that its height equals or exceeds the height of harvest
point, it produces a seed, in the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>noon</b>.
It is possible that the tree produces two seeds at the same time, but a tree
can produce at most two seeds in total.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here is her plan:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-21.0pt;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Every <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>afternoon</b>,
plant zero or more seeds. Those lunar seeds will become lunar tree of height <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>morning</b>. (if nothing else is done).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-21.0pt;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 21.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Every <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>evening</b>,
pour a glass of magic water onto a seed that has just been planted that <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>afternoon</b>, or onto a lunar tree. The
magic water makes the lunar tree grow <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b>
extra height unit. For seeds, they'll be lunar trees of height <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b> the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>morning</b>, for trees, their heights will increase by <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>, not <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>1</b>. She cannot pour onto two or more seeds or trees, and she cannot
pour onto no seeds or trees.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Linda wished that there would
eventually be, by her hand, a lunar forest of <b>m</b> trees, with all the
trees of the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>same</b> height. How fast
can this be?</p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line contains a single
integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t</b>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>1</b>&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t</b>&lt;=<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>25</b>), the number of test cases. Each
test case is a single line containing <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3</b>
integers: <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>HP1</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>HP2</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>HP1</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>HP2</b>&lt;=<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>8</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>&lt;=<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m</b>&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>16</b>)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each case, print the case number, followed by the
minimum number of days required.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                                  </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;

  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.6%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Problem setter: Rujia Liu<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Special Thanks: Derek Kisman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.0pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Explanation of Sample 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here is a table. We give tree
heights in the morning, number of seeds available in the noon, how many seeds are
planted in the afternoon, and which tree (or seed) is poured magic water. Since
trees are identical, we use height to denote a tree.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=43 valign=top style='width:.45in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Day<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Morning(heights)<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Noon(seed count)<o:p></o:p></b></p>

  watered)<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

 <tr>

  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  </td>

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border-top:none;border-left:

  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>3</p>
  </td>
  <td width=134 valign=top style='width:100.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>No action</p>
  </td>
  <td width=151 valign=top style='width:113.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Tree of Height 2</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=43 valign=top style='width:.45in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>5</p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>5, 4, 4</p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>4</p>
  </td>
  <td width=134 valign=top style='width:100.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>No action</p>
  </td>
  <td width=151 valign=top style='width:113.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Tree of Height 4</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=43 valign=top style='width:.45in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>6</p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>6, 6, 5</p>
  </td>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:30.0pt center .55in'>4<span
  style='mso-tab-count:1'>        </span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=134 valign=top style='width:100.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>No action</p>
  </td>
  <td width=151 valign=top style='width:113.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Tree of Height 5</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>You see, after 6 days (6 glasses of magic water were
poured), we'll have three trees: 7, 7, 7</p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="7169"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>The Story of Two Coins</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=SV>&nbsp;</span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>In this problem we have two coins (perfect
circles) in a two dimensional world. The radius of first coin is <b>R</b> and
the radius of the second coin is <b>r</b>. The first coin is static and the
location of its center <b>Q</b> is at the origin <b>(0,0)</b>. The second coin
(with radius <b>r</b>) is rotating in counter clock-wise direction like a wheel
on the perimeter of the first circle, as shown in the picture below. As it is
rotating counter clock wise so it is also moving along the surface of the first
circle in counter clock-wise direction. After the second coin has rotated
exactly once around the first coin, it stops. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><span style="mso-spacerun:
yes"> </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>
<center>
<img width=456 height=411
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/p10834.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025">
</center>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>At the beginning, the center of the second
coin (Denoted by <b>O</b> in the figure above) is on the <b>x</b>-axis and on
the right hand side of the first coin. So initially the coordinate of <b>O</b>
is <b>(R+r, 0)</b>. At this moment <b>P</b> is the topmost point of the second
coin. So obviously the coordinate of <b>P</b> is <b>(R+r, r)</b>. Now as the
second coin starts rotating the location of <b>P</b> will change due to both
circular translation and its own rotation. For most positions of the second
coin, <b>P</b> will not be its topmost point. <b>T</b> is any arbitrary point
on the perimeter of the moving second coin. If the Cartesian coordinate of <b>T</b>,<b>
(x,y)</b> is given, then it is possible to determine the position of the second
coin. Of course there can be two possible positions as shown in the figure
above. Now your job is a little bit difficult than this. Given the coordinate
of <b>T</b>, you will have to find the coordinate of <b>P</b> for two possible
positions of the second coin.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
18.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most <b>1000</b>
lines of inputs. Each line contains two positive integers and two
floating-point numbers. The two positive integers are <b>R</b>, <b>r</b> <b>(0&lt;|r|&lt;=|R|&lt;1000)</b>
and the two floating point numbers are <b>x</b> and <b>y</b> <b>(0&lt;|x|,|y|&lt;4000.0)</b>.
The meanings of these symbols are given in the problem statement above. All the
floating-point numbers in the input will have fifteen digits after the decimal
point.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
where the values of <b>R</b> and <b>r</b> are zero. Your program should not
process this line.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN-GB><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>For
each line of input produce three or two lines of output. The first line
contains the serial of output .The next two lines contain the possible
coordinates of <b>P</b> for two possible positions of the second coin. The
coordinates of <b>P</b> should be printed in chronological order (If a position
is reached by the second coin before the other position then the corresponding
coordinates of <b>P</b> should be printed first). If it is not possible to find
the coordinate of <b>P</b> for the given data, print <b>IMPOSSIBLE</b>
instead. There will be no such input that will cause the second coin to have
exactly one possible position. Also note that there will be no such input,
which will allow precision error to cause difference in the output. Assume that
<b>pi=2cos<sup>-1</sup>(0)</b>, and use at least double precision (<b>64</b>-bit)
floating-point numbers for your calculations. All floating-point numbers should
be rounded to three digits after the decimal point. Look at the output for
sample input for details.<span lang=EN-GB style='mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                                         </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS";font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="57%" valign=top style='width:57.92%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5 5 10.000000000000000 3.000000000000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5 5 20.000000000000000 10.000000000000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>0 0 0.000000000000000 0.000000000000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="42%" valign=top style='width:42.08%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre
  style='mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:
  around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
  column;mso-element-top:.05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
  style='mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:
  around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
  column;mso-element-top:.05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2.082 7.076<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
  style='mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:
  around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
  column;mso-element-top:.05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>11.755 2.606<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
  style='mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:
  around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
  column;mso-element-top:.05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Case 2:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>IMPOSSIBLE</span></b></h4>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Problem setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Problem F</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Playing with Coins</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:
</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Input</span><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Jack and Jill like to play with
coins. They are interested in the patterns generated after <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>n</b> times flip of a coin. As you know, in case of a fair coin if you flip
the coin 3 times, you can get either of the following patterns.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HHH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>THH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HHT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>THT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HTH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>TTH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HTT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>TTT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The numbers of different patterns
increase exponentially with the increase of number of flips. Jack and Jill categorizes
all the patterns considering the sub-patterns they have  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>H<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HHH, HHT, THH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>HHT, HTH, HTT, THT<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td valign=top style='border:solid windowtext .5pt;border-top:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>TTH<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border-top:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:123.05pt'><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>TTH<span style='mso-tab-count:
  1'>                    </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style="mso-spacerun:
yes"> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>It is not always possible to examine
each pattern. So, some intelligent technique is necessary to do such task. The
problem you need solve for Jack and Jill is to find the probability of getting
patterns which will not contain any of the previously defined sub-patterns.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each test case starts with a
positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N (1&lt;=N&lt;=50) </b>which
means the number of flips and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K
(0&lt;=K&lt;=50) </b>indicating the number of sub-patterns. Nest <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> lines will contain the sub-patterns
which will be a sequence of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>H</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>. All sub-patterns have same length and
it will be at most <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>10</b>. Input is
terminated by <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N=K=0</b>. This case
should not be processed. There can be at most <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>100</b> test cases.</p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Output of each test case should
consist of a line starting with Case #: where # is the test case number. It
should be followed by the probability of getting patterns which will not
contain any of the given <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b>
sub-patterns. If the probability is non-zero, then print it in the form of <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a/b</b> where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>a</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>b</b> are properly
reduced. If the probability is zero, then print <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>0</b> simply.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                               </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  background:silver;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>HH<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>HT<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>T<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><o:p></o:p></b></pre></td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:silver;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 5/8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 1/2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoHeading7 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:auto;text-autospace:ideograph-other'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Case 3: 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Problem setter: Md. Kamruzzaman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Special Thanks: Jimmy Mårdell </span></p>

<title>Problem G - The Maximum Term</title>

 /* Style Definitions */
p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

h1
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="10241"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>The
Maximum Term</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>According to
multinomial theorem we can write:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph><span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:353.25pt;
 height:45.75pt' o:allowoverlap="f">
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.gif"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=471 height=61
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
18.0pt'>When the value of k is 4 and the four variables within the bracket are w,
x, y and z we get tetranomial theorem which can be written as<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
18.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-text-raise:-23.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:264pt;height:53.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.gif"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=352 height=71
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1172603590">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span></p>

<p class=paragraph><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'><br clear=all>
You can see that right hand side of this equation is a summation of many terms.
If the values of <b>w</b>, <b>x</b>, <b>y</b>, <b>z</b> and <b>n</b> are given,
then all these terms will have a value. In this problem your job is to find the
value of the term with maximum value.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=paragraph>The input file contains at most <b>300</b> lines of input.</p>

<p class=paragraph>Each line contains five integers <b>n (5&#8804;n&#8804;300)</b>,
<b>w, x, y, z (0&lt;w, x, y, z&lt;301)</b>. These five integers are the values
of the five parameters of the tetranomial theorem above.</p>

<p class=paragraph>Input is terminated by a line where the value of all five
parameters are zero. This line should not be processed.</p>

<h3 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=paragraph>For each line of input produce one line of output. This line
contains at most eight digits. These eight digits are the eight least
significant digits (excluding the trailing zeroes) of the value of the highest
valued term. If the number is too small to have eight such digits print all
that are available (excluding the trailing zeroes).<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">   </span></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                                </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS";font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="98%" bgcolor="#cccccc"

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0 0 0 0</span></b><b><span

  SimSun;color:black;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.1%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span

setter: Shahriar Manzoor</p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Special

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="8193"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>A Research Problem</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>A mad
researcher was trying to get fund for his research project but it is a pity
that after a year he was able to collect <b>500$ </b>only. So all his research
work has gone to ashtray. The mad researcher now wants his revenge, so he wants
you to solve his unfinished research problem within a very limited time. You
will be happy to know that his research is related to Eulers phi function.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Euler's phi
(or totient) function of a positive integer <b>n</b> is the number of integers
in <b>{1,2,3,...,n}</b> which are relatively prime to <b>n</b>. This is usually
denoted as <b>&#966;(n)</b>. The table below shows the value of phi function
for first few numbers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
 <tr>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b>integer <i>n</i></b><b><span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>1<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>2<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>3<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>4<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>5<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>6<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>7<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>8<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>9<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>10<span
  style='font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>11<span

  </td>
  <td style='padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>13<span
