</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Warehouse</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A number of boxes is to be moved
in a warehouse. The warehouse can be modeled as a grid where each square is the
equal to the size of a box. Consider the model below: (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>B</b> = box to be moved, . = empty square, X = position a box
should occupy after the move, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>#</b> =
obstacle) </p>

<pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>BBBB....<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>.###...X<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>.XX#...X<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>...#....<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>........</span></pre>

<p style='text-align:justify'>A box may be moved to any of its four neighboring
squares, assuming this square is empty (that is, not occupied by another box or
an obstacle). To move a box takes one unit of time, and only one box may be
moved per time unit. Your task is to determine the least amount of time to move
all boxes to their destination squares. You may assume that a solution exists.
Number of boxes will be no more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>15</b>.</p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify'>The first line
in the input contains the number of test cases (at most <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>20</b>). Each case starts with a line containing two integers, the
height <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(1 &#8804; <i>h</i> &#8804; 40)</b>
and width <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(1 &#8804; <i>w</i> &#8804;
40)</b> of the grid. Then follows <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>h</span></b> lines, each containing <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>w</span></b>
characters, describing the grid in the format above.</p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;color:black'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-weight:normal'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each test case, output a
line containing a single integer: the minimum number of time units to move all
boxes.<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>&nbsp;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>5 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>BBBB....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>.###...X<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>.XX#...X<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>...#....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>........<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoHeading7 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:auto;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:black'>20<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: </span><span style='font-family:
"Trebuchet MS"'>Jimmy Mårdell</span><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>The Lost Gift</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Stan is in deep shock as he has lost some part of the precious gift given
by Olie. The precious gift was actually two boxes full of crystal balls. The
crystal balls of one box were all red and that of<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">   </span>the other box were all black. While handing over the gift Olie
told him with a wicked smile, Stan! If you mix the balls of the two boxes well
and randomly pick two balls from the mixture, the probability of them being the
same color is ½. Stan was returning home merrily with the two boxes, but
suddenly the box containing black balls fell from his hand and the black balls
scattered all around the place. Stan looked all around the place and was able
to collect at least 70 % of the black balls. Given the total number of red
balls and the number of black balls found your job is to find out the number of
lost black balls.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText>The input file contains at most <b>1001</b> lines of
input. Each line contains two positive integers <b>R</b> and <b>B</b>. Here <b>R</b>
is the total number of red balls and <b>B</b> is the number of black balls
found by Stan. Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes, which
should not be processed.<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>For each line of input produce one line of output. If the
number of red balls <b>R</b> is invalid according to the above story then print
No. of red balls invalid. If the number of red balls is valid but the number
of black balls found seems invalid then print the line No. of black balls
invalid instead. If the total number of red balls and black balls found seems
valid then print in a single line one or more integers. All these integers
denote the possible number of lost black balls. These numbers should be
separated by a single space and sorted in ascending order.</p>

<pre style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></pre>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                               </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>11 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  0</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoHeading7 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>No. of red balls invalid</span><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:.5in'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:419.15pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS";mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks:
Derek Kisman</span><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<style>

w\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}

<title>Problem D - Splat, Inc. </title>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:65.2pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=SV style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=SV style='font-size:
20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Maze</span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input File: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>d.in<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=SV>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>In this problem you are
given a square maze of dimension N with N*N blocks. Each block is numbered as
follows:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=SV><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:33.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=SV
  style='font-size:8.0pt'>0, N-1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=SV><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=SV><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=SV>The maze has only
one entry which is at (0, 0) and only one exit which is at (N-1, N-1). </span><span
lang=SV style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;color:black'>From each block you can
move in four directions (N, E, W, S) and the cost is 1 for each movement among
the maze but collecting treasure does not require any cost.. Some blocks
contain treasures that you will have to collect. Suppose there are T treasures
in the maze and you have to collect at least S (S </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=SV>&#8804; </span></b><span lang=SV style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;color:black'>T) treasures from them. In this problem, you are requested
to find an optimal way from starting location to ending location and take at
least S treasures from the maze. Remember that, you can visit a block more than
once if you want. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span lang=SV><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>The
first line of the input contains three integers N (N &#8804; 30), T (T &#8804; 30)
and S (S &#8804; 10 and S &#8804; T) describing the dimension of the maze,
number of treasures in the maze and number of treasures that you can take.
After that, there are T lines. Each line contains two numbers representing the
position of the treasure in the maze. The input may contain multiple test cases
and ends with three zeros for N, T and S.</span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=SV><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span lang=SV style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-weight:normal'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Each test case produces one line of output. This line should contain
the output serial no as shown in the sample output and </span>a number
representing the minimum cost which is required to collect the treasures.<span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:SV;mso-fareast-language:SV;mso-bidi-language:
AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
lang=SV style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                                 </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.58%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><a name="OLE_LINK1"></a><a name="OLE_LINK2"><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></a></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><span
  style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:

  <pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.42%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoHeading9>Case 2: 6</p>
  </td>
 </tr>

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--><o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="place"/>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Game of Sum</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input File: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>e.in<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=SV>&nbsp;</span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>This is a two player game.
Initially there are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>n</i></b> integer numbers in an array and players <b>A</b> and <b>B</b>
get chance to take them alternatively. Each player can take one or more numbers
from the left or right end of the array but cannot take from both ends at a
time. He can take as many consecutive numbers as he wants during his time. The
game ends when all numbers are taken from the array by the players. The point
of each player is calculated by the summation of the numbers, which he has
taken. Each player tries to achieve more points from other. If both players
play optimally and player <b>A</b> starts the game then how much more point can
player <b>A</b> get than player <b>B</b>?<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of a number
of cases. Each case starts with a line specifying the integer <em><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-style:normal'>n</span></b></em>
(0 &lt; n &#8804;100), the number of elements in the array. After that, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> numbers are given for the game. Input
is terminated by a line where <b>n=0</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print a
number, which represents the maximum difference that the first player obtained
after playing this game optimally.<span lang=EN-GB style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                                </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS";font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.84%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 -10 -20 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.16%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <h4><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Problem
setter: Syed Monowar Hossain<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Special Thanks:
Derek Kisman, Mohammad Sajjad Hossain</span></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>LCM Cardinality</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Time Limit: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 Seconds</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>A pair of numbers has a unique </span><b>LCM</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> but a single number can be the </span><b>LCM</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> of more than one possible pairs. For
example </span><b>12</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> is the </span><b>LCM</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> of </span><b>(1, 12)</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>, </span><b>(2, 12)</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>, </span><b>(3,4)</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> etc. For a given positive integer </span><b>N,</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> the number of different integer pairs with
</span><b>LCM</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> is equal to </span><b>N</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> can be called the </span><b>LCM</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> cardinality of that number </span><b>N</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>. In this problem your job is to find out
the </span><b>LCM</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> cardinality of
a number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>The input file contains at most </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>101</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'> lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>N (0&lt;N&lt;=2*10<sup>9</sup>)</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>. Input is terminated by a line
containing a single zero. This line should not be processed. </span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input except the last one produce one line of output. This line contains two
integers <b>N</b> and <b>C</b>. Here <b>N</b> is the input number and <b>C</b>
is its cardinality. These two numbers are separated by a single space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>12<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>24<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>101101291<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12
  8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>24
  11<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>101101291
  5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Problem
setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:"Trebuchet MS"'>Special Thanks: Derek Kisman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Creating Sudoku puzzles</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input File: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
<i>Sudoku</i> is an addictive puzzle game that recently has become very
popular. Given a <b>9x9 </b>grid, the task is to fill all empty squares with
the digits <b>1</b> to <b>9</b>, so that every row, every column, and every 3x3
box contains the digits <b>1</b> through <b>9</b> exactly once. Some of the
squares already have digits in them, and these must not be changed. A Sudoku
puzzle always have one unique solution. The figure below to the left is an
example of a Sudoku puzzle, and the figure to the right its solution.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shapetype
  id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
  path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
  <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
  <v:formulas>
   <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
  </v:formulas>
  <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
  <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
 </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
  left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:18pt;margin-top:14.4pt;width:431.85pt;
  height:209.5pt;z-index:1'>
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 align=left>
  <tr>
   <td width=24 height=0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=576 height=280 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/108/./g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
<![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<br style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, I wouldn't want to spoil the
fun of solving a Sudoku puzzle &quot;manually&quot; by asking you to write a
program to solve an arbitrary Sudoku puzzle. Instead, you're asked to write a
program which assists Sudoku puzzle designers. One way to construct new Sudoku
puzzles is to make them aesthetically appealing by letting the fixed digits
have nice patterns. The difficulty lies in making sure there is only one
solution to the puzzle you have created. This is where a computer program can
help. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Your task is, given a incomplete Sudoku puzzle
(meaning that it probably has more than one solution), complete the puzzle by
adding digits to the empty squares so that a puzzle with a unique solution is
created. No unnecessary digits may be added. That is, if you would remove any
of the added digits, a (invalid) puzzle with multiple solutions should appear.
Note that this does <i>not</i> mean that you have to create a puzzle by adding
the fewest numbers of digits (which is a much harder task). </p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>The first line in the input
contains the number of test cases (at most 25). Each case consists of 9 lines,
each line containing 9 characters. These lines make up the (incomplete) Sudoku
puzzle. A dot ('.') is used to mark empty squares. Test cases are separated
with a blank line.</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output 9
lines in the same format as the input describing a Sudoku puzzle based on the
input grid, satisfying the constraints above. Separate the test cases with a
blank line. Any valid solution will be accepted.<span lang=EN-GB
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                                </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS";font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="98%" bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:98.44%;margin-left:.05in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.9%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>4.29.58.3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>39.....6.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>..1...9..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>...5.1...<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span

o\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
w\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
.shape {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
</style>
<![endif]-->
<title>Problem H - Count the Numbers</title>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Save Hridoy</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>It would have been great if all the banners with good words could
inspire us all. Then we could only make large banners with good words on them
to make this world beautiful. With all the good wishes of our heart, we will
make such a banner today -- a banner to save a life<sup>1</sup> , a banner to
save humanity.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>In this problem the program generated banners will contain the text
SAVE HRIDOY. We will make this banner with different text size and two
possible types of orientations: horizontal and vertical. As we will make
banners of different size in plain monochrome text, we will use two different
ASCII characters to denote black and white pixels. In this process the smallest
possible banner (font size 1) for us in horizontal orientation is:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>*****..***..*...*.*****...*...*.*****.*****.***...*****.*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>*.....*...*.*...*.*.......*...*.*...*...*...*..*..*...*..*.*.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>*****.*****.*...*.***.....*****.*****...*...*...*.*...*...*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>....*.*...*..*.*..*.......*...*.*.*.....*...*..*..*...*...*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>*****.*...*...*...*****...*...*.*..**.*****.***...*****...*..</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>You can see
that here black pixels are formed with the <span style='font-size:18.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*</span> character and white pixels are marked
with the <span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>. </span>character.
In this banner, each character is represented in a <b>(5 x 5)</b> grid, two
consecutive characters in a single word are separated by single vertical dotted
line and the two words are separated by three vertical dotted lines. In case of
vertical banners (of font size 1) two consecutive letters in a single word are
separated by a horizontal dotted line and two words are separated three
horizontal dotted lines. Look at the second output for sample input to know how
vertical banners are formed. In case of a banner of font size <b>2</b>, each
pixel is represented by <b>(2*2)</b> grid of pixels. So actually a banner of
font size two has double the width and double the height of a banner of font
size <b>1</b>.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>The input file contains at most </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>30</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'> lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>N (0&lt;N&lt;51)</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>. This value of </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>N</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> denotes the font size and orientation of
a banner. <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>Input is terminated by a line containing a single zero.
This line should not be processed. </span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If <b>N</b> is positive then you
have to draw a banner of horizontal orientation and if <b>N</b> is negative
then you have to draw a banner of vertical orientation. The detailed
description of output for these two types of cases is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If <b>N</b> is positive then
produce <b>5N </b>lines of output. These lines actually draw the horizontal
banner. Two consecutive letters in a word are separated by <b>N </b>vertical
dotted lines. Two words are separated by <b>3N </b>vertical dotted lines.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If <b>N</b> is negative then
produce <b>5L*10+ 11L</b> lines of output, where <b>L</b> is the absolute value
of <b>N</b>. Two consecutive characters in a word are separated by <b>L</b>
horizontal dotted lines, and two words are separated by <b>3L</b> horizontal
dotted lines.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>After the output of each test
case print two blank lines.</p>

<h1><i><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;
font-weight:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></i></h1>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                             </span><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=649 valign=top style='width:486.9pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>-1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h1><i><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial;
font-weight:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></i></h1>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:1.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
for Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                            
</span><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

 <tr>
  <td width=649 valign=top style='width:486.9pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>***..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*.*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*..**<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>***..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*..*.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*..*.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>***..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*****<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*...*<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>.*.*.<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>..*..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********....******....**......**..**********......**......**..**********..**********..******......**********..**......**<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********....******....**......**..**********......**......**..**********..**********..******......**********..**......**<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**..........**......**..**......**..**..............**......**..**......**......**......**....**....**......**....**..**..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**..........**......**..**......**..**..............**......**..**......**......**......**....**....**......**....**..**..<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********..**********..**......**..******..........**********..**********......**......**......**..**......**......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********..**********..**......**..******..........**********..**********......**......**......**..**......**......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>........**..**......**....**..**....**..............**......**..**..**..........**......**....**....**......**......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>........**..**......**....**..**....**..............**......**..**..**..........**......**....**....**......**......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********..**......**......**......**********......**......**..**....****..**********..******......**********......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>**********..**......**......**......**********......**......**..**....****..**********..******......**********......**....<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-size:6.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><sup><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>1</span></sup><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'> Hridoy,
who is a student of the Computer Science and Engineering Department of
Bangladesh UET, is suffering from Leukemia. His friends, relatives and well-wishers
have are collecting the fund required to bear his treatment expenses and he is
now in Singapore for treatment. So now let us make this (SAVE HRIDOY) big
banner in our heart and pray. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><sup><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>2</span></sup><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'> The font
size of output is kept small to make it fit into page. </span></p>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>
