<html>
<title>Problem D - You want what filled?</title>

<h2>Problem D: You want what filled?</h2>

<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/p10946.jpg"  align="right" hspace=10 vspace=10>

Now that Ryan and Larry infuriated the bear, they're now forced to do menial tasks for food, one such task is filling
in potholes on this deserted island.  But of course, it's never quite that easy, as the bear forces them to fill in
the biggest hole first.  Since Ryan and Larry are still lazy (very little has changed, you see), can you tell them the order
to fill in the holes?
<BR><BR>
<h3>Input</h3>
The first line will contain two numbers <b>x</b> and <b>y</b>, followed by <b>x</b> lines of <b>y</b> characters each.  (x and y are 
less than 50).
The holes will be represented by the uppercase characters A to Z, and regular land will be represented by ".".  There will be
no other characters in the map.  Input will be terminated by having 0 0 as input.
<h3>Output</h3>
For each map, output the problem number (as shown below), then output the hole represented by the character, and the number 
of space the hole takes up, sorted by the size of the hole, break ties by sorting the characters in alphabetical order, as shown 
in the sample output on a separate line as shown below:
<BR><BR>
<h3>Sample Input</h3>
<PRE>
5 5
..AAA
E.BBB
..AA.
CC.DD
CC.D.
5 5
..AAA
E.BBB
..AA.
CC.DD
CC.D.
0 0
</PRE>
<h3>Sample Output</h3>
<PRE>
Problem 1:
C 4
A 3
B 3
D 3
A 2
E 1
Problem 2:
C 4
A 3
B 3
D 3
A 2
E 1
</PRE>

10947||||||false||||||
<html>
<title>Problem E - Bear with me, again..</title>

<h2>Problem E: Bear with me, again..</h2>

<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/p10948.jpg"  align="right" hspace=10 vspace=10>
There are bears everywhere!  In fact, look around, there might be one around you!
<BR>
Okay, maybe not.
<BR><BR>
Here's the story:
<BR>
Larry is trying to come up with some kind of escape plan from the island.. and then realizes that he's struck with nothing except
for Ryan, some duct tape, and some cardboard.  What are the odds?  He knows how to (somewhat) build a raft of sorts from it!
Unforunately for Larry, since his craftmenship isn't quite good, not to mention he really have no tools, he can only build a raft
that lasts <b>K</b> straight days at sea, after of which if it can get to an island, it can be fixed up and reused.  He notices 
that he and Ryan can row at a speed of <b>M</b> miles per day.  Still, with some luck, and Ryan's GPS (which came with the super-iPod, 
you see), he is able to see islands from far far away.  Somehow all the islands are perfectly circular... and he knows exactly where 
home is.. can he get there, hopping on islands along the way?
<br><br>
So doing some calculations, he realizes his fate..
<h3>Input</h3>
Everything will in miles.<br>
First line will contain the integers <b>K</b> and <b>M</b>, as defined above in the problem.<br>
The second line of each input will contain three integers, space limited:  <b>x</b>, <b>y</b>, <b>r</b>. <b>x</b> and <b>y</b> being
the coordinates of the current island, the <b>r</b> being the radius of the island (somehow, all the islands are perfectly circular.)<br>
Third line will contain three integers in the same format as above, will contain the location and radius of the island they want to
get to.<br>
Then there will be a single integer <b>N</b> which is followed by <b>N</b> lines, each in the format of <b>x_i</b>, <b>y_i</b>, 
and <b>r_i</b>, each representing an island coordinate and its radius in miles.  <b>N</b> will be at most 100.
<br><br>
No islands will have overlaps, and all integers representing coordinates and radius will be less than 200.
<h3>Output</h3>
For each test case, output
 
<pre>Larry and Ryan will escape!</pre>
 
if they can get back to their home island in some way, or
 
<pre>Larry and Ryan will be eaten to death.</pre>
 
if they cannot get home.

<!--For each test case, output one of the two possibilities:<BR>
<br>
Larry and Ryan will escape!<BR>
Larry and Ryan will be eaten to death.<BR>
<br>
The first if they can get back to their home island, the latter if they cannot, in some way.-->

<BR><BR>
<h3>Sample Input</h3>
<PRE>
1 1
0 0 1
0 3 1
0
1 1
0 0 1
0 5 1
0
1 1
0 0 1
0 6 1
1
0 3 1
</PRE>
<h3>Sample Output</h3>
<PRE>
Larry and Ryan will escape!
Larry and Ryan will be eaten to death.
Larry and Ryan will escape!
</PRE>

10948||||||false||||||
<html>
<title>Problem F - The primary problem.</title>

<h2>Problem F: The primary problem.</h2>

<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/p10948.jpg"  align="right" hspace=10 vspace=10 width=400>
Larry now lost most of his knowledge after spending a few years on deserted islands all over the place.  When Ryan brought
up the fact that every even number greater than 3 can represented as the sum of two prime numbers, he couldn't believe it!  
So now Larry is trying to come up with some kind of counterexample, and you can help him!
<h3>Input</h3>
Each line will contain an integer <b>N</b> greater than 3.  The input will terminate when <b>N</b> is 0.  <b>N</b> will not be
bigger than 1 million.
<h3>Output</h3>
For each test case, output one way of summing two prime numbers.  If there are more than one set of sums for which this is true,
choose the set of sum the maximizes the difference between them.  See the sample output.
If a number cannot be represented as the sum of two prime number, print "NO WAY!" as below:
<BR><BR>
<h3>Sample Input</h3>
<PRE>
4
5
6
7
9
10
11
0
</PRE>
<h3>Sample Output</h3>
<PRE>
4:
2+2
5:
2+3
6:
3+3
7:
2+5
9:
2+7
10:
3+7
11:
NO WAY!
</PRE>

Note:<BR>
10 can be 3+7 or 5+5, and since 7-3 is bigger than 5-5, we choose 3+7.

______________________________________________________
10949||||||false||||||

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Kids in a Grid</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
</span>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>Two kids are walking
in <span class=GramE>a</span> </span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>H x W</span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:
normal'> grid. Each square in the grid contains a character (whose </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>ASCII</span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> code lies between </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>33 and 127</span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>). Both kids can move
north, east, west and south each step. The first kid walked </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> steps, the second kid walked </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>M</span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> steps. </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>(0</span></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> &#8804; <span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</span></span> &#8804; <span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</span></span>
&#8804; <span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>20000)</span></span></b><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:
normal'>.<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>If we write down all
the characters each kid walks on, we get two strings </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>S<sub>A</sub></span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> and </span></span><span
class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>S<sub>B</sub></span></span><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>. your task is to
delete as few characters as possible, so that the two new strings are the
same.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>the</span>
first line contains a single integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t(1
&#8804; t &#8804; 15)</b>, the number of test cases. Each test case contains
several lines. The first line contains two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>H</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>W</b> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(1 &#8804; H, W &#8804; 20)</b>, the next <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>H</b> lines contains the grid. Next line
contains three integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X<sub>0</sub></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Y<sub>0</sub></b> (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; X<sub>0</sub>
&#8804; H</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; Y<sub>0</sub> &#8804;
W</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b> increases from North to
South, while <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b> increases from West
to East), indicating the first kinds walks from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>(X<sub>0</sub>, Y<sub>0</sub>)</b>, for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b> steps. The next line contains a string of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b> characters, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>E</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>W</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b> stands for North, West, South and
East, respectively. The second kid's information follows, which is the same
format.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You may assume the walk sequence
is correct: they will never go outside the grid.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case, print the case
number and two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X<sub>A</sub></b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X<sub>B</sub></b>, indicating the
number of characters deleted from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>A</sub></b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>B</sub></b>,
respectively.&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=399 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>ABCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>DEFG<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>ABCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>4 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>EEES<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>3 <span class=SpellE>3</span>
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>ABCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>DEFG<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>ABCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>4 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>EEES<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>3 <span class=SpellE>3</span>
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>NES<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=371 valign=top style='width:222.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext'>Case 1: 3 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext'>Case 2: 3 2</span></b><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem
setter: <span class=SpellE>Rujia</span> Liu, EPS<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>[<span class=GramE>note</span>]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>in</span> the
first sample, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>A</sub> =</b> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>ABCDG</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>S<sub>B</sub> = ADEB</b>, we must delete<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> 3</b> characters from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>A</sub></b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>from</span> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>B</sub></b>, so that they are the
same (both <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A<sub>B</sub></b> or <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A<sub>D</sub></b>)</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

______________________________________________________

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Bad Code</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
</span><span style='color:black'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>In his endless attempt to keep his secret
documents safe, Bob has designed yet another coding system. In this system, every
character is replaced by a unique positive integer value -- which we call the
code for a character. However, this system -- as expected -- is not the best in
the world. <span class=GramE>So more than one plain text can result in the same
encrypted string.</span> Here are a few more notes: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>The
     document consists exclusively of lower-case letters. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>The code
     for a letter is no more than 99. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>The
     encrypted string does not contain more than 100 characters. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>A code may
     or may not be preceded by a 0 in the encrypted string (note the 2nd sample
     test case). </li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the codes for each
character and the encrypted string, you have to find all the plain text strings
in alphabetical order that produces that encrypted string.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be no more than <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>500</b> test cases. Each test case starts
with an integer <b>N</b>, which gives the number of unique characters in the
document. Each of next <b>N</b> lines contains a character in the letter and
its code. The last line in the test case gives the encrypted string. The last
test case will have <b>N = 0</b>. This last test case need not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoHeader style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print the
test case number and the possible plain texts for the given encrypted string.
If there <span class=GramE>is</span> more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>100</b> possible strings report only the first 100 strings. Print a
blank line after the output for each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoHeader>&nbsp;</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                           </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=369 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>a 12<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>b 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>c 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>d 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>e 23<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>123<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>o 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>x 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1010101<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;color:black;mso-fareast-language:
  ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=401 valign=top style='width:240.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>ad<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:

  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b

  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b

<title>Problem C - Polynomial GCD</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <w:WordDocument>
  <w:View>Print</w:View>
  <w:Zoom>BestFit</w:Zoom>
  <w:SpellingState>Clean</w:SpellingState>
  <w:GrammarState>Clean</w:GrammarState>
  <w:ValidateAgainstSchemas/>
  <w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>false</w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>

  <w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>false</w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>
  <w:BrowserLevel>MicrosoftInternetExplorer4</w:BrowserLevel>
 </w:WordDocument>

 <w:LatentStyles DefLockedState="false" LatentStyleCount="156">
 </w:LatentStyles>
</xml><![endif]-->
<style>
<!--
 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
h1
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	mso-outline-level:1;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	font-weight:bold;}
h2
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:2;
	font-size:18.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoHeader, li.MsoHeader, div.MsoHeader
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.MsoFooter, li.MsoFooter, div.MsoFooter
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.MsoCaption, li.MsoCaption, div.MsoCaption
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:18.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoBodyText, li.MsoBodyText, div.MsoBodyText
	{margin:0in;

	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p
	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

	mso-gram-e:yes;}

	{page:Section1;}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Polynomial GCD</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Given two polynomials <b>f(x)</b> and <b>g(x)</b>
in <b>Z<sub>n</sub></b>, you have to find their <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>GCD</b> polynomial, <span class=SpellE>ie</span>, a polynomial <b>r(x)</b>
(also in <b>Z<sub>n</sub></b>) which has the greatest degree of all the polynomials
in <b>Z<sub>n</sub></b> that divide both <b>f(x)</b> and <b>g(x)</b>. There can
be more than one such polynomial, of which you are to find the one with a
leading coefficient of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> is the unity in <b>Z<sub>n</sub></b>.
Such polynomial is also called a <span class=SpellE><i>monic</i></span><i>
polynomial</i>). </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>(Note: A function <b>f(x)</b> is in <b>Z<sub>n</sub></b>
means all the coefficients in <b>f(x)</b> is <b>modulo n</b>.) </p>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be no more than <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>101</b> test cases. Each test case consists
of three lines: the first line has <b>n</b>, which will be a prime number not
more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1500</b>. The second and third
lines give the two polynomials <b>f(x)</b> and <b>g(x)</b>. The polynomials are
represented by first an integer <b>D</b> which represents the degree of the
polynomial, followed by <b>(D + 1)</b> positive integers representing the
coefficients of the polynomial. <span class=GramE>the</span> coefficients are
in decreasing order of Exponent. Input ends with <b>n = 0</b>. The value of <b>D</b>
won't be more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output</span></h2>

<p class=MsoHeader>For each test case, print the test case number and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>r(x)</b>, in the same format as the input</p>

<p class=MsoHeader>&nbsp;</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=414 valign=top style='width:3.45in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 2 <span
  class=SpellE>2</span> 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>4 1 0 2 <span
  class=SpellE>2</span> <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></pre></td>
  <td width=420 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case 1: 2 1 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Arial;
color:black'>Problem setter: <span class=SpellE>Sadrul</span> <span
class=SpellE>Habib</span> <span class=SpellE>Chowdhury</span></span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'>Special
Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span>, EPS<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Arial;color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-family:Arial'>Note: The first sample
input has <b>2x<sup>3</sup> + 2x<sup>2</sup> + x + 1 </b>and <b>x<sup>4</sup> +
2x<sup>2</sup> + 2x + 2 </b>as the functions.</span></i><span style='font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6146"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:65.2pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoPlainText align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span lang=SV
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
lang=SV style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Pattern
Transformations</span></b><span lang=SV><br>
</span><b><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US'>Consider the two patterns of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'O'</b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'X'</b> below (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>'.'</b> represent an empty square). We want the first pattern to be transformed
into the second pattern in one time unit. During this time unit, each symbol (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'O'</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>'X'</b>) can move one step in any of the four directions (or remain at
its current square). All movements happen simultaneously, so a symbol can move
to an occupied square, if that symbol is moved to some other square. If a
symbol moves from square <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b> to <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>B</b>, and the symbol at <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>B</b> moves to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>A</b>, we have a <i>swap</i>. Write a program which calculates the
least number of swaps needed to transform a given pattern into another given
pattern. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>.XO<span class=GramE>..</span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>..<span class=GramE>XO.</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>..<span class=GramE>O..</span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>.XX<span class=GramE>..</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>.XX<span class=GramE>..</span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>..<span class=GramE>O..</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US'>To transform the first pattern above into the second one requires one
swap: The two symbols in the first line are moved to the <span class=GramE>right,</span>
the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'O'</b> in the second line must be
swapped with the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'X'</b> below. The
other <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>'X'</b> is moved up.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3 style='text-align:justify'><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The
first line in the input contains the number of test cases to follow (at most </span><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>20</span><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>). Each test case starts with a line containing two
integers, </span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>w</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>
and </span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>h</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> </span><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>(1 &#8804; </span><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>w</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>,
</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>h</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> &#8804; 8)</span><span lang=SV
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>, the width and height of the two patterns. Then
follow </span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>h</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>
lines describing each row of the two patterns (the two patterns will be
separated with a single space, see the sample input). The only allowed
characters in the patterns will be the symbols </span><span lang=SV
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>'O'</span><span lang=SV
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>, </span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>'X'</span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>
and </span><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>'.'</span><span
lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>. <o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<h1 style='text-align:justify'><span lang=SV style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For
each input you should output a line containing a single integer: the least
number of swaps required to transform the first pattern into the second. If the
transformation is not possible, output<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>a
-1. <o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<h1><span lang=SV>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                    </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
lang=SV style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=402 valign=top style='width:3.35in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>5 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>.XO<span
  class=GramE>..</span> ..XO.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
  EN-US'>O..</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
  mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>X X<span class=GramE>..</span>O<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US'>XOXO OXOX<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.preformatted, li.preformatted, div.preformatted
	{mso-style-name:preformatted;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.8in .8in .8in .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Stochastic Digit Generator</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br>
</span><span style='color:black'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>A stochastic
digit generator <b>(SDG)</b> generates a decimal digit with a certain
probability. The probability of the generation of one digit may be different
than the other. Suppose this generator is allowed to generate <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> digits of a number one after another
from right to left (least significant to most significant). &quot;What is the
probability that this number has a specific remainder when divided by <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>11</b>?&quot; In this problem you will have
to determine such probabilities with some additional constraints.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most <b>51</b>
blocks of input. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>The description
of each block starts with an integer </span><b>10</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> in a single line, which indicates that this is a valid input set and
the probability of the generation of </span><b>10</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> decimal digits follow. Each of the next </span><b>10</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> lines contains a decimal digit </span><span
class=SpellE><b>d<sub>i</sub></b></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>
and a floating-point number </span><b>p<sub>i </sub>(1 &#8804; I &#8804; 10)</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>. These lines indicate that the generator
generates the digit </span><span class=SpellE><b>d<sub>i</sub></b></span><sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </span></sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>with probability </span><b>p<sub>i</sub></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>. Note that values of all </span><span class=SpellE><b>d<sub>i</sub></b></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> will be distinct <span class=GramE>and </span></span><b><span
style='position:relative;top:8.0pt;mso-text-raise:-8.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:66pt;
 height:27pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=88 height=36
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192098381">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>. Next line
contains an integer </span><span class=GramE><b>Q(</b></span><b>0 &lt; Q &lt;
21)</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> which indicates the number of
queries for this set. Each of the next </span><b>Q</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> lines contains a format string </span><span class=SpellE><b>S<sub>i</sub></b></span><b>
(1&#8804;i&#8804;Q)</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> which
actually denotes the format of the generated number followed my an integer </span><span
class=GramE><b>r(</b></span><b>0 &#8804; <span class=SpellE>r<sub>i</sub></span>
&#8804; 10)</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>. Each character of
the format string will either be an </span><b>*</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> (asterisk) or a decimal digit. An asterisk in a position means that
the generator can generate any digit for that <span class=GramE>position,</span>
a decimal digit indicates that for those places the generator doesnt work and
generates only that specific digit. The format strings will have maximum </span><b>50</b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> characters <span class=GramE>The</span>
integer </span><span class=SpellE><b>r<sub>i</sub></b></span><b> </b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>denotes that when the generated number is
divided by </span><b>11</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> the
remainder will be </span><span class=SpellE><b>r<sub>i</sub></b></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input is
terminated by a block whose first line contains a zero.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each block
of input produce <b>Q+1</b> lines of output. The description of output for each
block is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>The first line
contains the serial of the block. Each of the next <b>Q</b> lines contains a
floating-point number with eight digits after the decimal point. The <span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b>-th</span>
floating-point number indicates the probability that the numbers generated
according to the format string <span class=SpellE><b>S<sub>i</sub></b></span>
has reminder <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><b>r<sub>i</sub></b></span></span><sub>
</sub>when divided by <b>11</b>. </p>

<p class=MsoHeader>&nbsp;</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=384 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>4 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>5 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>6 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>7 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>8 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>9 0.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>*** 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>12* 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1** 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>121 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>121 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;color:black;mso-fareast-language:
  ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=386 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0.09100000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0.10000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in .8in 1.0in .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
table.MsoTableGrid
	{mso-style-name:"Table Grid";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
	mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6146"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:18.0pt'>Add All</span></b><br>
<b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'> standard input<br>
<b>Output:</b> standard output<br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Yup!! The problem name reflects
your task; just add a set of numbers. But you may feel yourselves condescended,
to write a C/C++ program just to add a set of numbers. Such a problem will
simply question your erudition. So, lets add some flavor of ingenuity to it. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Addition operation requires cost now,
and the cost is the summation of those two to be added. So, to add <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>10</b>, you need a cost of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>11</b>.
<span class=GramE>If you want to add <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>3</b>.</span> There are several ways  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=246 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1 + 2 = 3, cost = 3</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>3 + 3 = 6, cost = 6</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Total = 9</p>
  </td>
  <td width=246 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1 + 3 = 4, cost = 4</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>2 + 4 = 6, cost = 6</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Total = 10</p>
  </td>
  <td width=246 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>2 + 3 = 5, cost = 5</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1 + 5 = 6, cost = 6</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Total = 11</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>I hope you have understood already your mission, to add a
set of integers so that the cost is minimal. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal>Each test case will start with a positive number, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N (2 &#8804; N &#8804; 5000)</b> followed by
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> positive integers (all are less
than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100000</b>). Input is terminated by
a case where the value of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> is zero.
This case should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each case print the minimum total cost of addition in a
single line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>               </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>            </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=369 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=401 valign=top style='width:240.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>9<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>19<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoCaption>Problem setter: Md. Kamruzzaman, EPS</p>

</div>

</body>

	tab-stops:0in 47.95pt 95.9pt 143.85pt 191.8pt 239.75pt 287.7pt 335.65pt 383.6pt 431.55pt 479.5pt;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:windowtext;}
p.IOSample, li.IOSample, div.IOSample
	{mso-style-name:IOSample;
	mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:Courier;
	mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:windowtext;
	mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:.8in .8in .8in .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
 @list l0
	{mso-list-id:925727640;
	mso-list-template-ids:2128135658;}
@list l0:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	mso-ansi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:Symbol;}
@list l0:level2
	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l0:level6
	{mso-level-tab-stop:3.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l0:level7
	{mso-level-tab-stop:3.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l0:level8
	{mso-level-tab-stop:4.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:4.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1
	{mso-list-id:1165166195;
	mso-list-template-ids:1461233330;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;

	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level3
	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level4
	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level5
	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level6
	{mso-level-tab-stop:3.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level7
	{mso-level-tab-stop:3.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level8
	{mso-level-tab-stop:4.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:4.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l2
	{mso-list-id:1182665976;
	mso-list-template-ids:2087888018;}
@list l2:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;

	{mso-list-id:1320306084;
