</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>The Great Escape<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Poor
Kianoosh! 6 weeks since he was officially accepted as a citizen of Barareh and
during this time he has had nothing but Nochophskew for his breakfast, lunch
and dinner. And nowadays, during the nights, he dreams of nothing but a small
piece of bread, some cheese and a glass of milk to have for his breakfast. And
during the days, he thinks of nothing but a great escape from this weird city
in order to turn his night-time dreams into reality.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>After
carefully checking all the potential ways out of the city, he concluded that
there are only three such possible ways. The first one is through the city gate
which is of course guarded by fully-armed guards, ready to kill any creature
trying to go through the gate without permission. The second way is passing
through the northern walls of the city and going through a jungle which
contains nothing but those deadly snakes called NeshimanGazes (And be sure that
Kianoosh does not like to repeat his creepy experience with them again).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Finally,
the third and the last (and of course the only feasible) way is passing through
a secret door in the famous so called <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName
 w:st="on">HezarDaroon</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Castle</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>
(means a castle with thousands of doors). Unfortunately, the problem with this
castle is that no one actually knows the way to reach this secret door.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>After
spending some time gathering information about the castle, Kianoosh found out
that HezarDaroon can actually be modeled as an <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1047" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:27.75pt;
 height:11.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=37 height=15
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1047"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912257">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>grid with each cell
representing a room in the castle. There is always a door between two
neighboring rooms but there are some rooms which contain a NeshimanGaz ready to
serve anyone trying to enter the room with its poisonous bites.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>There
are also some rooms which contain a rotating door. A rotating door is actually a
cylinder positioned at the center of the room with a slice removed from it. In
Figure 1, you can see a room with a rotating door with its removed slice facing
towards west.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1046" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:194.25pt;height:141pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=259 height=188
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1046"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>Figure 1. A Rotating Door</span></b></span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>As
it can be seen, one can only enter the room from the neighbor to which the
removed slice is facing. And once Kianoosh enters the room, he can rotate the
door clockwise or counter-clockwise in order to reach the other doors in the
room. For example, in the configuration of figure 1, if he rotates the door
clockwise by 90 degrees, he can reach the door to the north and if he continues
rotating the door by another 90 degrees in the same direction, he can reach the
door to east. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Another
important fact about the rotating doors is that associated to each door is a
number <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1045" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:11.25pt;height:14.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=15 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1045"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912259">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>which is the amount of
time, measured in seconds, that it takes for a normal human-being(like
Kianoosh) to rotate the door by 90 degrees. You may also assume that going from
a room to its neighbor room takes exactly 1 second.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Today,
after spending a noticeable amount of money, Kianoosh managed to buy a map of
the castle from underground shops of Barareh. Taking a look at the map, he
found that the entrance to the castle is located at the lower-left corner and
the secret door is located at the upper-right corner of the grid. He can also
see the position and the initial configuration of the rotating doors and the
coordinates of rooms containing the deadly NeshimanGazes to which Kianoosh does
not like to enter.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Kianoosh
is happy. He is only one step away from his dreams coming true. But how can he
find his way to the secret door? Yes! He needs help! And as a genius
problem-solver, you should help him find the path with the minimum required
time to reach the secret passage from the lower-left corner of the castle.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>The Input
<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>The
first line of the input contains an integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1044" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:33.75pt;height:12pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=45 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1044"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912260">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>which is the number of
test cases. Each test case begins with a line containing <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1043" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;height:12pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=67 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1043"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912261">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(the number of rows) and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1042" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:45pt;height:12pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=60 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1042"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912262">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(the number of columns) followed by <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1041" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:11.25pt;height:9.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=15 height=13
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1041"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912263">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>lines, with the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1040" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:6.75pt;height:12pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=9 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1040"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912264">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th line containing <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1039" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:9.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=12 height=13
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1039"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1033"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912265">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>characters, the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1038" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:14.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=12 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1038"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1034"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912266">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th character of which representing the status of the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1037" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:14.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=12 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1037"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1035"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912267">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th cell in the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1036" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:6.75pt;height:12pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=9 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1036"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1036"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912268">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th row of the grid (counted from north). Each character may
have six different values. A </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Courier New"'>.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt'> character represents a
normal room while a </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>#</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'> represents a room containing a NeshimanGaz and </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>, </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Courier New"'>W</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>, </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>E</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>, </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Courier New"'>S</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt'> represent a room with a
rotating door facing north, west, east, and south respectively. The map is
followed by <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12pt;height:11.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=16 height=15
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1035"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1037"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912269">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>integers, the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1034" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:12.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=12 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1034"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1038"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912270">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span class=GramE>th</span> of which is equal to <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1033" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:15pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=19 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1039"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912271">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>for the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:12.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=12 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1040"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912272">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th door, counting the doors from the north-west corner in a
row major order. You can assume that <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1031" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12pt;height:11.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img border=0 width=16 height=15
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p3_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1041"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912273">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(which is the number of rotating doors in the castle) is no
more than 500, and the entrance (room at lower-left corner) and the room
containing the secret door (room at upper-right corner) does not contain
NeshimanGazes or rotating doors.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>The Output
<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>For
each test case, your program should output a line containing a single integer
which is the minimum amount of time required for Kianoosh to reach the secret
door. In the case the secret door is not reachable with respect to the given
map and rules, a line containing the phrase </span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Poor Kianoosh</span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt'> should be printed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>.#.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>..W<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>...<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>14<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>
Amirkabir University of Technology - Local Contest - Round #2
</span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</body>

</html>

<title>Problem E</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>KuPellaKes<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>In
ancient times, many territories were under the control of a powerful king called
Basm. Basm is well-known in history because of his strange works and as a
result, there are many history-lovers who wish to know more about him. Koorosh
is one of them and he has worked hard to find a way to know more about Basms
works. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Recently,
he managed to invent a Time Machine and traveled to the past to Basm time in
order to be able to see and study his weird works thoroughly. Unfortunately, he
has been caught by royal guard soldiers of Basm and is now in his prison. Basm
ordered him to solve a problem if he wants to stay alive. King Basm wants to change
the structure of roads of his newly captured territory, KuPellaKes in such a
way that each city has an even number of neighboring cities. Now, he wants to
know the minimum number of roads that should be destroyed in order to satisfy
this condition. Note that each city must have at least one neighbor city after
the road destruction process. Also, It should be noted that in the given
territory at most two cites of KuPellaKes have an odd number of neighboring cities
and there is at most one road between two cities. Also, there is no road from a
city to itself.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>The Input <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Input
consists of several test-cases. Each test-case starts with a line containing three
<span class=GramE>numbers </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;
 height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=67 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912293">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <i>m</i> indicating the number of cities and roads in KuPellaKes
respectively. Next <i>m</i> lines, each containing two numbers <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:45pt;height:14.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=60 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912294">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>indicating that there
is a road between the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:6.75pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=9 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912295">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span class=GramE>th</span> and the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:14.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=12 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p4_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912296">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th city. Note that all the roads are bidirectional. Input
will be terminated with a line containing three zeros.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>The Output <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>For
each test-case, your program should output the minimum number of roads that
should be destroyed. In the case that this task is impossible the phrase </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Poor Koorosh</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'> should be printed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>
Amirkabir University of Technology - Local Contest - Round #2
</span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</body>

</html>

<title>Problem F</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>Sweet Dream<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Are
you ready to have a sweet dream? OK! Close your eyes (Hey! Do NOT! I was
kidding! How can you read the problem statement with your eyes closed? Umm! Let
me think . . . Yes! There is a good solution to this problem. Simply, hand this
paper to your teammate and let him read it aloud for you)! <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>.
. . You are standing in the middle of a room and you have a handful of discs of
different sizes. They are heavy. You somehow feel uncomfortable. Calm down and dont
worry! I am going to help you feel comfortable again. Simply choose one of the
discs in your hand randomly and drop it on the floor. Yes! You feel a little
more comfortable. Choose and drop another! Then another one! . . . And continue
this process until your hands are empty. Now, you are as light as a feather and
you are ready to fly away . . .<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>But
dont be so quick! Before flying away, you should solve a problem. Open your
eyes and take a look at the floor. You see the discs youve just dropped (To
the teammate reading this problem aloud: Show the contents of figure 1 to your
teammate who is going to open his eyes now). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:177.75pt;
 height:140.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=237 height=187
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  alt="Adobe Systems" v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>Figure 1.</span></b></span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt'> Discs on the floor viewed from the above<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>You
can see that some discs are partially (or totally) covered by other discs. Your
job is to compute the total perimeter of parts of the discs that you can see
from the above. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Umm!
I think you feel a little bit uncomfortable again. Am I right?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Input <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>The
first line of input contains a single integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:33.75pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=45 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912353">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>which is the number of
test cases. Each test case starts with a single <span class=GramE>integer </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:36pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=48 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912354">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, the number of discs originally in your hand followed by <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=16 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912355">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>lines, the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:12.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=12 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912356">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th of which containing three floating-point numbers which are
<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:54.75pt;
 height:15pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=73 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912357">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, radius of the <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1031"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:9pt;height:12.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=12 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912358">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->th disc and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1032"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:117.75pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=157 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912359">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>the coordinates of the
point on the floor on which the disc has fallen. Two floating-point numbers are
assumed to be equal if their absolute difference is less <span class=GramE>than
</span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1033" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:24.75pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=33 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p5_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1033"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912360">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Output</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output
for each test case consists of a line containing a floating-point number which
is the total perimeter of part of discs that can be seen from above rounded to
3 decimal digits after the fraction point. The number should have exactly 3
digits after the fraction point. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>10 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>5 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>10 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>62.832<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>62.832<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>10.472<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>
Amirkabir University of Technology - Local Contest - Round #2
</span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

@page Section1
	{size:595.35pt 842.0pt;
	margin:1.0in 89.85pt 1.0in 89.85pt;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>Big Chocolate<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Mohammad
has recently visited <st1:country-region w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Switzerland</st1:place></st1:country-region>.
As he loves his friends very much, he decided to buy some chocolate for them,
but as this fine chocolate is very expensive(You know Mohammad is a little BIT
stingy!), he could only afford buying one chocolate, albeit a very big one (part
of it can be seen in figure 1) for all of them as a souvenir. Now, he wants to
give each of his <span class=GramE>friends</span> exactly one part of this
chocolate and as he believes all human beings are equal (!), he wants to split
it into equal parts.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>The
chocolate is <span class=GramE>an</span> <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;
 height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912430">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>rectangle constructed
from <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:30pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912431">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>unit-sized squares.
You can assume that Mohammad has also <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912432">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>friends waiting to
receive their piece of chocolate.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>To
split the chocolate, Mohammad can cut it in vertical or horizontal direction (through
the lines that separate the squares). Then, he should do the same with each
part separately until he reaches <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912433">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>unit size pieces of
chocolate. Unfortunately, because he is a little lazy, he wants to use the minimum
number of cuts required to accomplish this task.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Your
goal is to tell him the minimum number of cuts needed to split all of the chocolate
squares apart.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align="center">
<img align="center" src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz" ></img>
</div>
<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'>Figure 1.</span></b></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'> Mohammads chocolate<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='color:#3366FF'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Input <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>The
input consists of several test cases. In each line of input, there are two <span
class=GramE>integers </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:51.75pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=69 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912434">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, the number of rows in the chocolate and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=67 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p6_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912435">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, the number of columns in the chocolate. The input should be
processed until end of file is encountered.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Output <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>For
each line of input, your program should produce one line of output containing
an integer indicating the minimum number of cuts needed to split the entire
chocolate into unit size pieces.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>
Amirkabir University of Technology - Local Contest - Round #2
</span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</body>

</html>

	text-indent:-1.0in;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>Building Construction<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>According
to recent activities in the Computer Engineering department, ACM (Association
for Construction Management) has signed a contract with the department to build
some pre-constructed blocks which can be attached to each other and easily form
a building.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>These
blocks are cubes and have facilities for being attached to other blocks face to
face. The problem is that these connecting facilities are not the same. Each of
the 6 faces of a block has its own type of connector named 1 to 6 respectively,
as shown in figure 1. To connect two cubes to each other, their adjacent faces
must have the same connector type or the sum of their connector numbers must be
equal to 7.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:#3366FF'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:#3366FF'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:106.5pt;
 height:75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=142 height=100
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'>Figure 1.</span></b></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'> Shape of a block<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:#3366FF'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Faculty
will give ACM a map for constructing the building. The building is actually <span
class=GramE>an</span> <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:45.75pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=61 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912475">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>rectangular prism.
Furthermore, faculty has decided to have some of the blocks on some faces of
the prism fixed. In other words, some of the blocks on the faces of the prism
must have a predetermined connector facing outside. Given a map for the building
to be constructed, you must help ACM to decide whether it can build the
requested building with respect to the limitations of the problem or not.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:211.5pt;height:186.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=282 height=249
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'>Figure 2.</span></b></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;color:black'> A <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:33pt;height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=44 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912476">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->Construction<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Input <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>The
first line of the input file consists of a single <span class=GramE>integer </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:60pt;height:12.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=80 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912477">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, the total number of test cases. For each test case, there
is a line <span class=GramE>indicating </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:71.25pt;height:12.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=95 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p7_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912478">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. After this line, comes the description of each face of the whole
building. Each number shows that which face of a block must be seen in that
position. Whenever a ? is represented, it means there is no difference in which
face of the block to be used there. </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-language:FA'>Only 3 faces of the whole prism are given. </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>F</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-language:
FA'>irst you will see <i>K</i> rows each one with <i>N</i> columns,
representing face T (top face of the building). Then, there is <i>M</i> rows
each one with <i>N</i> columns, representing face F (front face) and at last,
there is <i>M</i> rows each one with <i>K</i> columns, representing face R (right
side face). The order each face is introduced is the same as figure 2.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-language:
FA'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>The Output</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>For
each line of input, simply write </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>YES</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt'> if it is
possible to arrange blocks in some way which fits in the conditions of the input
or write </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>NO</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'> if it is not possible.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>11<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>11<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>22<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>22<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>33<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>3?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>YES<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='color:black'>
Amirkabir University of Technology - Local Contest - Round #2
</span></b><span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Problem I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:0in;text-align:center'><span class=SpellE><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt'>RevolC</span></b></span><b><span style='font-size:
14.0pt'> <span class=SpellE>FaeLoN</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Hopefully,
you can remember Koorosh from one of the previous problems. Fortunately,
Koorosh has solved <span class=SpellE>Basms</span> problem without your help!
Now, he is a high-ranked advisor of <span class=SpellE>Basm</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>As usual, <span class=SpellE>Basm</span> has
conquered a new territory, called <span class=SpellE>RevolC</span> <span
class=SpellE>FaeLoN</span>. In order to make the people of <span class=SpellE>RevolC</span>
<span class=SpellE>FaeLoN</span> satisfied, he wants to solve one of their
basic problems. The <span class=SpellE>RevolC</span> <span class=SpellE>FaeLoN</span>
has a high annual <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>rate of camel accidents and <span
class=SpellE>Basm</span> wants to make the roads of this territory
unidirectional in order to reduce the accident rate.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>He
wants to do this task in such a way that each city has at least one path to
every other city. Now, <span class=SpellE>Basm</span> has asked Koorosh to find
the minimum number of unidirectional roads which need to be constructed (in addition
to the task of making the existing roads unidirectional) in order for every
city to be reachable from every other city. Note that the original graph
representing the territory is simple but during the road construction process,
extra roads can be constructed between two cities that have already been connected
to each other by a road.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>The Input <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Input
consists of several test-cases. Each test case begins with two numbers <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;
 height:12pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p8_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=67 height=16
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p8_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912520">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and <i>m</i> which are
the number of cities and roads of <span class=SpellE>RevolC</span> <span
class=SpellE>FaeLoN</span> respectively. The next <i>m</i> lines, each contain
two <span class=GramE>integers </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:59.25pt;height:12.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p8_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=79 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/109/images/p8_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1192912521">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, indicating that there is a road between <i>u</i> and <i>v</i>.
The input is terminated by end of file.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>The Output <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>For each
test-case, print the minimum number of roads that should be constructed to make
Basms decision possible.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10
11<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 7<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 6<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7 9<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>9 8<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

	font-family:Symbol;}

	{mso-list-id:-126;
	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:-982989246;}
@list l6:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-style-link:"List Bullet 3";
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.75in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.75in;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	font-family:Symbol;}
@list l7
	{mso-list-id:-125;
	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:-2130683588;}
@list l7:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-style-link:"List Bullet 2";
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	font-family:Symbol;}
@list l8
	{mso-list-id:-120;
	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:1374819120;}
@list l8:level1
	{mso-level-style-link:"List Number";
	mso-level-tab-stop:.25in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.25in;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l9
	{mso-list-id:-119;
	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:-1248851946;}

	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-style-link:"List Bullet";
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;

	{margin-bottom:0in;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin:0in;
